h2_title: Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: And if the rage-filled roars and resulting deadly attacks weren’t bad enough, the Mad Tiger also has a secret grab. It seems to happen most often in retaliation for getting staggered, causing him to fall to his knees placing one hand on the ground. As he rises, he’ll do so with a quick leap toward you, landing with a quick uppercut.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
And if the rage-filled roars and resulting deadly attacks weren’t bad enough, the Mad Tiger also has a secret grab. It seems to happen most often in retaliation for getting staggered, causing him to fall to his knees placing one hand on the ground. As he rises, he’ll do so with a quick leap toward you, landing with a quick uppercut.
